data.title: Loughborough University
data.meta_description: Centrally located on campus, Falkner Eggington is a newly renovated budget self-catered hall with shared bathrooms and an inclusive and lively community spirit.
data.text:
Undergraduates

All rooms offered on a 41 week let (plus additional fee for freshers week included).

£4,864.95 (£117.03 per week) - Standard, without wash hand basin (463 beds)

All fees above include utilities, wired and wireless network, housekeeping service, out of hours Warden Service, Endsleigh insurance policy cover and hall activities.

Please note: If you are a returning student to halls, you will have a 41 week let contract, but only be charged for 39 weeks, meaning you get to enjoy two weeks in halls for free.

Postgraduates

All rooms offered on a 50 week let.

£5,903.01 (£116.73 per week) - Standard, without wash hand basin

All fees above include utilities, wired and wireless network, housekeeping service, out of hours Warden Service, Endsleigh insurance policy cover and hall activities.

Undergraduates

41 week let (New Undergraduates): 25 September 2024 – 12 July 2025

41 week let (Returning Students): 27 September 2024 - 12 July 2025

41 week let (International Pathway ONCAMPUS Students): 24 September 2024 12 July 2025

18 week let (Semester 1): 25 September 2024 - 31 January 2025

23 week let (Semester 2): 2 February 2024 - 12 July 2025

Rooms available throughout the Christmas and Easter vacations.

Rooms to be vacated by 10:00 on the end date of the contract.

Postgraduates

50 week let: 25 September 2024 - 13 September 2025

Rooms available throughout the Christmas and Easter vacations.

Rooms to be vacated by 10:00 am on the end date of the contract.

The Student Hall Committee are on hand to offer support to the hall community. The committees are elected annually and are run by students for students.

For more information visit the hall website. Please note this is not a Loughborough University website, but is produced and managed by the students on the committee. We accept no liability for the content on the hall website.

All halls have their own Facebook page and all new students moving into this hall will be invited to join.
